name: Hulafrog
tag_list: hyperlocal, local, city, parents, moms, women, events, web, consumer
overview:
Hulafrog is a network of local websites for suburban moms, and a compelling advertising opportunity for both main street merchants and national brands.

Each website fills a void in the community by serving as the go-to source for events, classes, restaurants, shopping & more for kids. A daily â€œOur Pickâ€ newsletter delivers the inside scoop on canâ€™t-miss family activities & special offers from local businesses.

Using a direct sales business model (think Yelp meets Avon), Hulafrog recruits moms as local publishers who manage content and sell advertising, earning commissions on their siteâ€™s revenue. New publishers complete â€œHula U.,â€ a 3-month training program, to ensure consistency & quality. All sites are owned by Hulafrog, Inc.
